author: R Krithika
title: The ‘Contagion’ equivalent for books: a coronavirus lockdown reading list
description: There have been plenty of viruses in the literary world. This time, we look at books about pandemics, real and imaginary
content: Many people are talking about Dean Koontzs The Eyes of Darkness (first published in 1981) as having predicted the coronavirus pandemic. The book talks about a fictional virus called Wuhan-400, developed as a biological weapon. However, in the initial editions… [+1833 chars]
